polyrun

Class SamplerRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • polyrun.SamplerRunner
  • Deprecated. 
    This class will be removed in version 1.0.0. Use PolytopeRunner instead.

    @Deprecated
public class SamplerRunner
extends Object
    Runner of Sampler. Prepares system of constraints, generates start point and allows to process samples of generated sampled using interface SampleConsumer.

        public double[][] sample(ConstraintsSystem constraintsSystem,
                         int numberOfSamples)
                  throws UnboundedSystemException,
                         InfeasibleSystemException
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        constraintsSystem - system of linear constraints (Ax≤b, Cx=d) that is expected to be consistent and Ax≤b to be full-dimensional
        numberOfSamples - number of samples
        Returns:
        samples
        Throws:
        UnboundedSystemException
        InfeasibleSystemException
